Glo Skin Beauty Soothing Gel Mask

Brand: Glo Skin Beauty

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sclerotium Gum, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Alcohol, Cassia Angustifolia Se

ssia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Centella Asiatica Extract, Copper PCA, Dextrin, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Extract, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Soybean Peroxidase, Superoxide Dismutase

Directions: Apply a smooth, even layer to skin after cleansing and toning. Leave on for 10 minutes then remove with a soft, damp cloth. Use up to 3 times p

Use up to 3 times per week.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
